question: Area of triangle formed by points \( t_1,t_2,t_3\) of parabola
Area of triangle formed by tangents at points \( t_1, t_2, t_3\) of parabola
answer:
\( \frac 12 a^2|(t_1-t_2)(t_2-t_3)(t_3-t_1)| \)

This is 1/2 times area of triangle formed by the points itself
